function.name: execute_shell_command
function.description: Constructs a shell command with arguments to carry out the request.

command.description: The shell command to execute. Bash syntax is allowed

function.name: say
function.description: Display a static message to the user.

message.description: The message to display. Remember you can use $SHELLM_PREVIOUS here to display output of previous tools.

function.name: generate
function.description: Display a LLM-generated output to the user. Supply a suitable prompt describing the output you request from the LLM.
